title: Proclamation (No. 2), 2015
content:
19thAugust,2015 Statutory Instruments 201
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.65 OF2015
The Constitution of Zambia
Proclamation (No. 2) of 2015
SummoningofParliament
WHEREASitisprovidedbyArticle88(1)oftheConstitutionthat
eachsessionofParliamentshallbeheldatsuchplacewithinZambia,
andshallcommenceatsuchtimeasthePresidentmayappoint:
ANDWHEREASitisexpedientthatParliamentshould besummoned:
NOWTHEREFORE,underandbyvirtueofthepowersinmevested,
I, EDGAR CHAGWA LUNGU, President of the Republic of
Zambia,doherebyproclaimandmakeknownthattheFifthSession
ofthe EleventhParliamentshallresumeinLusakaat 1000hours
onthe18thdayofSeptember,2015.
GIVEN under my hand and the Public Seal of the Republic at
Lusakathis19thdayofAugust,2015.
SEAL
EDGARC.LUNGU,
LUSAKA President
19thAugust,2015
[NAS.7/48]
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK2.00 each
202 Statutory Instruments 19thAugust,2015
